#id=1
#text=Once , when I was 12 , I had a flat bicycle tire .
#id=2
#text=I had ridden over a nail and my tire was punctured and my tube popped .
#id=3
#text=In order to fix it my brother took me the store so I could buy a patch to fix the tire .
#id=4
#text=Once we got the patch , we went back to the house .
#id=5
#text=In order to find the hole we filled the tub with water and put the tube in .
#id=6
#text=We looked to see where bubbles came out ; where the bubbles came out told us where the hole was .
#id=7
#text=Once we noted the location of the hole we took the tube out of the tub and dried it .
#id=8
#text=To put on the patch we had to put a glue on the tube and then put on the patch .
#id=9
#text=We held it there a few minutes to make sure it would stay , then we let it sit for an hour to make sure the glue would dry .
#text=To make sure it dried well we placed the tube out in the sun so the the heat could help it along .
#text=To be safe we waited a day .
#text=The next day we took the tube and put it back in the tire , then we put the tire on the wheel .
#text=My bike was good to ride again .
